attributes.action: Pressure Maclaren to take same safety action in the UK for pushchairs that are identified as a safety risk to infants in America
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Owners of one million Maclaren pushchairs in the US have been told to stop using them after 12 children have had their fingers amputated in the hinge. 

Owners in the US are being sent a safety kit, but UK owners of identical models will only get extra guidance on their use. If there is a risk to US children, there is a risk to any children. Please urge Maclaren to issue safety fix to UK customers in the same way there are for US customers.

rejection.details:
We suggest you contact Consumer Direct if you have concerns. 
http://www.consumerdirect.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
